artist: Natori Shunsen; Published by Watanabe Shōzaburō
creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: male figure, LRC, wearing blue and white dot-patterned kimono; female figure, L, wearing blue and pink patterned kimono; grey ground
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
text: Twenty-third design of a set of 36. Imagined portrait of the actors Ichikawa Shōchō II (1886-1940) as Umegawa and Kataoka Gadō XII (1882-1946) as Chūbei in the kabuki drama Koi bikyaku Yamato orai 恋飛脚大和往来 (A message of love from Yamato).
title: The Actors Ichikawa Shōchō II as Umegawa and Kataoka Gadō XII as Chūbei
